動物用藥品名稱: 禽必威雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎、傳染性華氏囊病不活化混合疫苗
業者名稱: 台灣英特威動物藥品股份有限公司
地址: WIM DE KORVERSTRAAT 35, 5831 AN BOXMEER, THE NETHERLAND
效能(適應症): 種雞、蛋雞：預防雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎、傳染性華氏囊炎。
ingredients: 6 LOG2 HI UNITS(HAEMAGGLUTINATION INHIBITINGUNITS) ANTIBODY TITER INDUCING INACTIVATED AVIAN IB VIRUS, STRAINM41 (SEROTYPE MASSACHUSETTS); 14.5 LOG2 VN UNITS (VIRUS NEUTRALI-ZING UNITS) ANTIBODY TITER INDUCING INACTIVATED AVIAN INFECTIOUSBURSAL DISEASE VIRUS, STRAIN D78; 50 PD50 (PROTECTIVE DOSE 50%)INACTIVATED ND VIRUS, STRAIN CLONE 30.
